alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 9:35PM MST until February 03 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Prowers and Baca Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wed morning and evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
